'''Beta 1.18.10.22''' is the third beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.10]], released on December 9, 2021,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4416062048397|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.18.10.22 (Xbox / Android)|website=feedback.minecraft.net|date=December 9, 2021}}</ref> which brought more parity from {{el|je}} and fixes bugs. Due to quality issues, this version is not available on Windows.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Anvil]]'''
* Slightly changed the hammer texture on its GUI.

'''[[Barrel]]'''
* Changed the bottom texture to match the spruce planks.

'''[[Carrot]]'''
* Texture of crop <code>stage3</code> was changed from [[File:Carrots Age 7 JE8.png|32px]]{{verify|Is this exact model (UV, etc.) the one used in this edition at this point?}} to [[File:Carrots Age 7 JE9.png|32px]]{{verify|Is this exact model (UV, etc.) the one used in this edition at this point?}}, removed an extra pixel.

'''[[Cartography Table]]'''
* Texture was changed from [[File:Cartography Table JE2 BE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Cartography Table JE3.png|32px]], to match the dark oak planks texture after being updated a second time in the [[Texture Update]].

'''[[Cocoa Beans]]'''
* Textures of cocoa pods (<code>stage0</code> and <code>stage1</code>) were changed.

'''[[Dirt Path]]'''
* Side texture was changed to better match its top texture.

'''[[Door]]'''
* Changed spruce door's model,{{verify|as opposed to changing the general door models? was a new model specifically added for spruce doors with unique mapping?}} to fix top/bottom texture.
* Changed textures of oak doors and iron doors to remove a horizontal line.

'''[[Glass Pane]]'''
* Top texture was changed to better match its side texture.

'''[[Lectern]]'''
* Base texture was changed to match the oak planks texture after being updated a second time in the Texture Update.

'''[[Log]]s'''
* Changed the top texture of dark oak log.
* Changed the side texture of stripped dark oak log, to match the color of its top texture.

'''[[Stained Glass]]'''
* Changed textures of blue stained glass and red stained glass, to match transparency of other types of stained glass.

=== Items ===
'''[[Beetroot Seeds]] and [[Melon Seeds]]'''
* Textures were moved down by 1 pixel.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Axolotl]]'''
* Texture of the wild axolotl was changed.

'''[[Evoker]], [[Vindicator]] and [[Witch]]'''
* Removed hoods in their textures. 
** Vindicator now have blue eyes.<ref>{{bug|MCPE-140420|Vindicators have green eyes - Fixed}}</ref>

'''[[Parrot]]'''
* The bottom texture of all parrots' wings has been flipped.

'''[[Slime]]s'''
* Now attack snow golems again.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Armor Stand]]'''
* Smooth stone outline texture was changed.

=== General ===
'''[[RenderDragon]]'''
* All Android devices now use new rendering engine RenderDragon.

=== Technical ===
'''General'''
* Reduced the number of network packets sent with the subchunk request system and packet optimizations.

'''Items'''
* Added 9 new shapeless recipe JSON files, replacing hard-coded Smithing Table crafting recipes.

'''Molang'''
* Add non-experimental is_name_any, is_item_name_any, and is_owner_identifier_any queries.

== Fixes ==
'''Blocks'''
* Worlds with inconsistent layers of bedrock between Y=1 and Y=4, inclusive, (such as those where non-bedrock has generated or been placed in those layers) now correctly and consistently replace bedrock with deepslate ({{bug|MCPE-149251}}).
* Light Blocks can now be placed on other Light Blocks while sneaking ({{bug|MCPE-137744}}).

'''Gameplay'''
* Fixed a crash that could occur when trading Maps with Cartographer Villagers ({{bug|MCPE-142388}}).
* Fixed food giving effects 20 times too long ({{bug|MCPE-148553}}).
* Fixed Honey Bottles not removing poison effect.
* Fixed players not teleporting after eating Chorus Fruit.
* Players’ viewing direction will no longer snap when facing South in a Boat ({{bug|MCPE-148460}}).
* When a player dies, the camera now tilts to the right instead of the left ({{bug|MCPE-148604}}).
* Lava hitbox no longer extends beyond lava. ({{bug|MCPE-148506}})

'''Graphical'''
* Updated Dirt Path side texture ({{bug|MCPE-148568}}).
* Changed 'door_oak' texture filename back to 'door_wood' ({{bug|MCPE-148502}}).
* Reversed Parrot head and wing bottom textures ({{bug|MCPE-148573}}).
* Moved Beetroot and Melon Seed textures 1 pixel row down to match Java Edition ({{bug|MCPE-148561}}).
* Removed unused pixels in Cocoa Beans stage 0 and stage 1 textures to match Java Edition.
* Updated Smooth Stone texture in Armor Stand base ({{bug|MCPE-148565}}).
* Removed horizontal lines in Oak and Iron upper Door textures ({{bug|MCPE-148566}}).
* Removed hood in Witch, Evoker, and Vindicator textures to match Java Edition.
* Changed alpha values of Red and Blue Stained Glass textures to match Java Edition (Vanilla Parity).
* Fixed the hammer icon's color palette on the Anvil screen ({{bug|MCPE-148575}}).
* Updated Dark Oak Planks on the Cartography table textures ({{bug|MCPE-148562}}).
* Updated Spruce Planks on the Barrel bottom texture.
* Updated Planks on the Lectern base texture ({{bug|MCPE-148567}}).
* Fixed highlight inconsistencies in Gold and Diamond Armor textures ({{bug|MCPE-148591}}).
* Removed wandering pixel in the Carrot stage 3 texture ({{bug|MCPE-148563}}).
* Centered the back texture of Axolotls ({{bug|MCPE-148571}}).
* Updated Glass Pane top to match the new texture on Java Edition ({{bug|MCPE-148572}}).
* Fixed the top texture of Dark Oak Logs ({{bug|MCPE-148577}}).
* Updated Stripped Dark Oak side texture to match the new texture on Java Edition ({{bug|MCPE-148576}}).
* Fixed a bug where End Crystal beams would stop rendering when an End Crystal is out of the players sight ({{bug|MCPE-149159}}).
* Fixed an issue with Drowned textures on some devices with RenderDragon not correctly discarding alpha/transparent pixels.

'''Mobs'''
* Slimes are once again aggressive towards Snow Golems ({{bug|MCPE-146651}}).

'''User Interface'''
* Fixed the player visual on the inventory screen while gliding. It was previously off-center and could hide elements of the interface.
* The "Invite to Game" button on the pause screen now disables correctly when a server is full.

'''Technical'''
* Fixed relative_block_has_all_tags block_neighbor_has_all_tags and biome_has_all_tags queries to require all tags rather than just any tags.
* Fixed nested conditional (ternary) operator parsing to go right-to-left instead of left-to-right.</onlyinclude>
